name: Online FPS Game (Panther Game Studios)
description:
A game where you can make rooms with your friends and play an online shooter!

WASD to move. Shift to sprint. Number keys to switch to different weapons.

1 - Rifle (45 damage, 2 second cooldown)

2 - Pistol (20 damage, 1 second cooldown)

3 - Sniper (95 damage, 4 second cooldown)

4 - Shield (1 damage, 1/24 second cooldown, blocks hits). If you fire, then your screen might get crowded up!

5 - Machine Gun (4 damage, 1/10 second cooldown)

Escape key to show your mouse in the game.

Also, press H to heal, but you can't move fast or shoot.
